description: Adds tasks, schedules, and preconditions to the specified pipeline. You can use PutPipelineDefinition to populate a new pipeline. PutPipelineDefinition also validates the configuration as it adds it to the pipeline. Changes to the pipeline are saved unless one of the following three validation errors exists in the pipeline. Pipeline object definitions are passed to the PutPipelineDefinition action and returned by the  GetPipelineDefinition action.

parameters.name: pipelineObjects
parameters.description: The objects that define the pipeline. These objects overwrite the existing pipeline definition. (dict) --- Contains information about a pipeline object. This can be a logical, physical, or physical attempt pipeline object. The complete set of components of a pipeline defines the pipeline. The ID of the object. The name of the object. Key-value pairs that define the properties of the object. (dict) --- A key-value pair that describes a property of a pipeline object. The value is specified as either a string value ( StringValue) or a reference to another object ( RefValue) but not as both. The field identifier. stringValue (string) --- The field value, expressed as a String. refValue (string) --- The field value, expressed as the identifier of another object.

nested_params.name: fields
nested_params.description: Key-value pairs that define the properties of the object.

nested_params.name: stringValue
nested_params.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

nested_params.name: refValue
nested_params.description: The field value, expressed as the identifier of another object.

parameters.name: parameterObjects
parameters.description: The parameter objects used with the pipeline. (dict) --- Contains information about a parameter object. The ID of the parameter object. The attributes of the parameter object. (dict) --- The attributes allowed or specified with a parameter object. The field identifier. The field value, expressed as a String.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the parameter object.

nested_params.name: attributes
nested_params.description: The attributes of the parameter object.

nested_params.name: stringValue
nested_params.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

parameters.name: parameterValues
parameters.description: The parameter values used with the pipeline. (dict) --- A value or list of parameter values. The ID of the parameter value. The field value, expressed as a String.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the parameter value.

nested_params.name: stringValue
nested_params.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

nested_items.name: validationErrors
nested_items.description: The validation errors that are associated with the objects defined in pipelineObjects.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the object that contains the validation error.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A description of the validation error.

nested_items.name: validationWarnings
nested_items.description: The validation warnings that are associated with the objects defined in pipelineObjects.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the object that contains the validation warning.

nested_items.name: warnings
nested_items.description: A description of the validation warning.

nested_items.name: errored
nested_items.description: Indicates whether there were validation errors, and the pipeline definition is stored but cannot be activated until you correct the pipeline and call PutPipelineDefinition to commit the corrected pipeline.
